lemming.user

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • lemming.data.DatedEntity
      • lemming.user.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.security.Principal

    @Entity
public class User
extends DatedEntity
implements java.security.Principal, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a user with one role.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
